titles.title: Boating and Aviation Operation Safety Act of 1997
To amend title 11 of the United States Code to make nondischargeable a debt for death or injury caused by the debtor's operation of watercraft or aircraft while intoxicated.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commercial and Administrative Law.

bill.summary: 1/7/1997--Introduced. Boating and Aviation Operation Safety Act of 1997 - Amends Federal bankruptcy law to make nondischargeable in bankruptcy a debt for death or personal injury caused by the debtor's operation of a watercraft or aircraft while intoxicated from alcohol, a drug, or other substance.
